basic_information.scholarship_name: Vivian Lanier Endowed Scholarship for Humanities

description: This scholarship is in memory of UCO Professor, Vivian Lanier, for her teaching and mentorship. It provides for a student showing great promise in Humanities in order to aid in the studentÂ’s quest for knowledge. Eligibility Requirements Declared Humanities major Minimum 18 hours completed in Humanities degree Shows promise toward Humanities degree/GPA considered Outstanding analytical ability and dedicated to the subject matter Special consideration will be given to students who have acted as a tutor or plan on pursuing a teaching career Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
